item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (439 points | 235 comments)
2. $8k Suzuki from India received a 5-star crash test rating (192 points | 168 comments)
3. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (125 points | 30 comments)
4. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (316 points | 80 comments)
5. Building Observability with ClickHouse (34 points | 9 comments)
6. Rim/Blackberry tales – reply all (12 points | 2 comments)
7. Listen to what gets lost when an MP3 is made (2015) (38 points | 18 comments)
8. 20 years of Google Scholar (298 points | 142 comments)
9. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (128 points | 18 comments)
10. Sequin: A powerful little tool for inspecting ANSI escape sequences (57 points | 14 comments)
11. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (294 points | 525 comments)
12. Scientific American's departing editor and the politicization of science (105 points | 112 comments)
13. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (232 points | 70 comments)
14. How to Build a Quantum Supercomputer: Scaling Challenges and Opportunities (5 points | discuss)
15. Llama 3.1 405B now runs at 969 tokens/s on Cerebras Inference (378 points | 117 comments)
16. DOJ will push Google to sell off Chrome (618 points | 711 comments)
17. New textbook teaches students about matrix methods and their real world apps (46 points | 12 comments)
18. Museum of Bad Art (173 points | 123 comments)
19. Hyrumtoken: A Go package to encrypt pagination tokens (57 points | 31 comments)
20. Batched reward model inference and Best-of-N sampling (13 points | discuss)
21. Take the 'Death Stairs' If You Dare (6 points | 1 comment)
22. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (253 points | 108 comments)
23. It's hard to stop Math Acceleration once you start (66 points | 58 comments)
24. Show HN: Dumbo – Hono inspired framework for PHP (54 points | 46 comments)
25. PyTorch 101: Understanding Graphs, Automatic Differentiation and Autograd (32 points | 2 comments)
26. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (222 points | 228 comments)
27. The tragedy of running an old Node project (116 points | 150 comments)
28. Iumenta: A generic framework for animal digital twins (14 points | 3 comments)
29. Rats learned to drive (178 points | 79 comments)
30. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (187 points | 44 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
